More examplesFewer examplesHe sent a glower in Lissa's direction. She gave me an intense glower. The glower then returned, as did the fierce staring, his eyes flashing across the spectators.Her father's eyebrows and icy glower had caused her to redden under his gaze.His goofy grin dissolves into a glower, his eyes turn cold as ice.
